PenmuxModule.Name: Snipper
PenmuxModule.Description: Snipper module that reads in csv files that have different useful snippets. Will be copied into clipboard

Option.Name: SnippetSearchPath
Option.Description: Path that contains CSV files that holds the snippets

Option.Name: ClipboardCommand
Option.Description: Command used for copying snippet to clipboard

Consumes.Name: HttpUri
Consumes.Description: Provides the final http server base uri. Can be used by other modules to store files
